title: The Phinney Phantom
description: A mysterious figure known as the Phinney Phantom has been leaving puzzles around Phinney Ridge. Follow the trail, solve each clue, and uncover what they’re trying to reveal.
hunt_intro_text:
Welcome to the Neighborhood Investigations Bureau! We look into the small mysteries most people overlook.

Lately, someone calling themselves the **Phinney Phantom** has been leaving puzzles in strange places around Phinney Ridge. Each puzzle leads to another location, but our team stalled while following the trail. We need fresh eyes.

This morning, a note appeared at the Phinney Center that matches the Phantom’s earlier work. It looks like an invitation.

{{handwritten}}
If you’re reading this, you’re paying attention. Solve the first puzzle, and I’ll show you where to go next.
{{/handwritten}}

Follow the Phantom’s trail, solve what they’ve left behind, and see where it leads. Your investigation starts here.
hunt_success_text: Thanks for helping to solve the mystery of the Phinney Phantom! Make sure to check out some of the other mysteries around Seattle that need solving.

locations.name: Phinney Center
locations.location_riddle: You decide to search around the Phinney Center to see if the Phantom left you any other clues.
locations.location_found_text:
Searching in the bushes, you find a lockbox with a note on it. I guess the only thing left to do is to open it and see what else the Phantom has in store for you.

{{handwritten}}You may **address** me as the Phinney Phantom{{/handwritten}}

locations.name: Sully's Snow Goose Saloon
locations.location_riddle:
The box contains another note with a simple poem.
{{handwritten}}So you accepted my challenge,
Unpacked what I hid.
Looking for more clues?
Leave this place and head south.
You must take the first letters,
Spell out your next stop.
{{/handwritten}}
locations.location_found_text:
You step into Sully’s Snow Goose Saloon. The bartender slides a small safe across the counter and nods toward it.

“We found this outside last night,” he says. “Maybe you can make some sense of it.”

Attached is another note.
{{handwritten}}So you accepted my challenge,
Unpacked what I hid.
Looking for more clues?
Leave this place and head south.
You must take the first letters,
Spell out your next stop.
{{/handwritten}}
